attributes.action: stop advertisments of a sexual nature
attributes.additional_details: Adverts displayed in public that are of a sexual nature should be removed as they have a negative effect on children and society at large. Many companies are using images of barely dressed man and women and they conflict with our social morality. The images that are used are the stuff of porno graphical magazines of the last century. Save our society from indeceny

rejection.details: This is a matter for the Advertising Standards Authority.
